QuoteText: As a moore fan, do you find the distortions presented in the movie at all disturbing?
ResponseText: I don't really know much about the distortions. Sorry. I don't have a lot of knowledge on the topic. I just thought that the movie was well organized and interesting. Especially the part with Marilyn Manson. I had always viewed him as 'bad' or whatever but he presented himself really well during his interview.
